# Code examples

### Sync Workers for a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";


ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    const Operator = ServisBotApiSdk.Operator;
    
    const botId = "<Bot ID>";
    
    return Operator.syncWorkers( botId );
  })
  .then((result) => {
    console.log(result);
  });
```
